changes.detail: Moved log and exp tables from Class instance to module-level local variables.
changes.purpose: Eliminates repeated object property lookups (this.) during millions of math operations.

changes.detail: Extended the exp table size from 512 to 1024 bytes.
changes.purpose: Allows div() and mul() to handle wrapping via simple addition, removing the expensive modulo (%) operator.

changes.detail: Mapped log[0] to 511 (pointing to a zeroed region in the extended exp table).
changes.purpose: Removes the need for if (a === 0) checks inside tight loops, reducing CPU branch mispredictions.

changes.detail: Implemented BigUint64Array views to process XOR operations on 8 bytes simultaneously.
changes.purpose: Increases raw XOR throughput by up to 8x for Systematic packets using native 64-bit CPU instructions.

changes.detail: Added logic to split packets into 'Aligned Vector' (divisible by 8) and 'Tail Subarray'.
changes.purpose: Prevents RangeError crashes on arbitrary packet sizes while maintaining vectorization speed.

changes.detail: Implemented Pre-computed Look-up Table strategy (256-byte array per coefficient).
changes.purpose: Replaces millions of GF.mul calls with single memory reads, halving encoding time for heavy math.

changes.detail: Switched from Buffer.alloc to Buffer.allocUnsafe (with immediate zero-fill).
changes.purpose: Reduces memory allocation overhead during high-frequency encoding cycles.

changes.detail: Bypassed GaloisMatrix.get/set methods to manipulate underlying Uint8Array directly.
changes.purpose: Removes function call overhead during critical inner loops of Gaussian Elimination.

changes.detail: Introduced pre-allocated this.swapBuf to handle row exchanges.
changes.purpose: Prevents Garbage Collection spikes by avoiding temporary array creation during pivoting.

changes.detail: Ported Multiplication S-Box logic into custom _gaussianEliminationOptimized method.
changes.purpose: Synchronizes Decoder performance with Encoder, reducing decoding time by ~70%.

changes.detail: Added ns/byte (Latency) and Decode/Encode Ratio calculations.
changes.purpose: Provides hardware-independent efficiency scores to benchmark optimization success.

changes.detail: Added configuration toggles to test both Systematic and Non-Systematic scenarios.
changes.purpose: Revealed the 'Performance Cliff' and guided specific optimizations for the Decoder.
